A1.name: Precision Adder
A1.Z: offset = ±10V in 1V steps derived from Z
A1.A: X + Y + offset, or X + offset
A1.B: X – Y – offset, or Y ± offset

parameters.name: Z Mode
parameters.description: (when 1, the scale is not restricted to integer steps, and changes smoothly with Z).

A2.name: Four Quadrant Multiplier
A2.Z: scale = 1/10 to 10x in steps derived from Z

parameters.name: Z Mode
parameters.description: (when 1, the scale is not restricted to integer steps, and changes smoothly with Z).

A3.name: Full-wave Rectifier
A3.A: abs( X + Y ) or abs( X )
A3.B: abs( X - Y ) or abs( Y )

B2.name: Slew Rate Limiter
B2.A: linear slew rate limited ( X + Y )
B2.B: log slew rate limited ( X + Y )

B3.name: Pitch and Envelope Tracker
B3.A: V/octave pitch derived from X, plus Y

B8.name: VCO with waveshaping
B8.A: A & B are selectable output waveforms

parameters.name: Offset for input Y (manual shape control).

C1.name: Precision Adder (fractional offsets)
C1.Z: offset in steps derived from Z

parameters.name: Applies an offset to the Y input.

C4.name: Clockable Ping Pong Delay (Z input pan)

parameters.name: Applies an offset to the Y input.
Applies an offset to the Y input.
Sets the number of phaser stages.

C8.name: Bit Crusher
C8.Y: sample rate input Z sets bit reduction

parameters.name: Applies an offset to the Y input.

D1.name: DJ Filter
D1.X: X & Y are stereo audio input
D1.A: A & B are stereo audio output

G5.name: Tuner
G5.B: a sine wave at the tracked pitch

G8.name: CV/MIDI
G8.Z: mod wheel or velocity CV input
G8.A: A & B pass through X & Y

H1.name: Crossfade/Pan
H1.A: Mix of X & Y according to Z
H1.B: Inverted mix of X & Y according to Z, or LFO

H6.name: Dual Delayed Pulse Generator
H6.Z: Z function depends on parameter setting

H8.name: Quantizer 2
H8.Y: trigger input or pitch CV input

I2.name: Clocked Audio Playback
I2.Z: Z selects the sample, or start position

parameters.name: Selects the sample and function of Z.

I8.name: Dual Audio Playback with Z Speed

parameters.name: Select which sample(s) are affected by Z.

K1.name: Wavetable VCO
K1.B: sub-octave square output or detuned output

K7.name: Stereo Clockable SD Delay
K7.X: X & Y are stereo audio inputs
K7.A: A & B are stereo audio outputs

K8.name: Stereo Clockable SD Delay (Z clock)
K8.X: X & Y are stereo audio inputs
K8.A: A & B are stereo audio outputs

L3.name: Dual Reverb
L3.X: X and Y are audio inputs

M1.name: Delayed LFO
M1.A: A and B are LFOs, ramps, or ramped LFOs

M2.name: Scaled LFO
M2.X: X and Y are min/max or offset/scale

M3.name: Logic
M3.Z: Z selects logical operation for output
M3.A: A and B are logic outputs

N2.name: Rotary
N2.A: A and B are stereo outputs

N8.name: Clockable SD Ping Pong
N8.A: A & B are stereo audio outputs
